title: HELP
body: So, iv already submitted a discussion about this before, got told what to do ( get in touch with the support system) i tried, but i cant log into it because my password has been changed, and i cant remember doing it or when, also, cant verify my email because its an old one and dont remember that password either, so is there anyother way riot can help me recover my account from s2 ?

replies.body:
You can submit an account recovery ticket without signing in. Just select "I need help recovering my account." from the drop down on the submission page: 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416
